page.title: 16PUNKS AND SKINHEADS,BATH
page.content: In Bath,we have {punks}and{skinheads.} { Skinheads}go around in gangs and they usually have no hair.They wear Union Jack T.shirts and Dr. Martins boots. They some times wear chains round their bleached jeans.Some skinheads have studs through their noses and ears. They usually go round town causing trouble. Some{skinheads {are}N.F.,i.e. National Front supporters. If there is a fight between {punks}and skinheads, the skinheads usually win. { { Punks}usually hang around in town. Most punks have different coloured hair and some take gas.They carry chains on their trousers and they wear leather jackets.Some{punks}have rings in their noses.{Punks }fight with skinheads but the{skinheads usually win. Punks call the police the "fuzz".
